title: Ki'tzen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: A vegan/vegetarian restaurant makes its own rice and lentil flour and uses no preservatives or trans fat. Gluten free available. Serves mostly vegan options. Main dishes are pizza made with rice flour; jicama, oats, veggie tacos; carrot, wheat and lentil hamburgers; baguettes, different breakfast options; broccoli or vegetable soup. Drinks include fruit juices, organic coffee and artisanal beer.
